option.description: A generic information item.
option.name: Information

option.description: An expectation of a products functionality or quality property.
option.name: Product Requirement

option.description: States the product/feature idea, defines target platform and SOP and is the initial hook within the specification.
option.name: Feature One Pager

option.description: Details the intended feature. Essential statement of the customerâ€™s expectation and intention regarding the product.
option.name: User Story

option.description: An expectation of a function's functionality or quality property.
option.name: Technical Requirement

option.description: Sequence of tasks that a system can perform, interacting with users of the system and providing a measurable result of value for the user
option.name: Use Case

option.description: Description of how a given hazard is to be avoided
option.name: Safety Goal

option.description: Operating mode of a system with an acceptable level of risk
option.name: Safe State

option.description: Describes, a situation caused by a threat scenario, which shall NOT occur because it may has a negative effect on the security of the system.
option.name: Cybersecurity Goal

option.description: An abstract behavioral entity which is not deployed yet.
option.name: Functional Artefact

option.description: An expectation of a system of system's functionality or quality property.
option.name: System of Systems Requirement

option.description: A specific architectural element of a system of systems.
option.name: System of Systems Architecture Artefact

option.description: An expectation of a machine's functionality or quality property.
option.name: Machine Requirement

option.description: A machine specific architecture artefact.
option.name: Machine Architecture Artefact

option.description: An Integrated System specific requirement.
option.name: Integrated System Requirement

option.description: An Integrated System specific architecture artefact.
option.name: Integrated System Architecture Artefact

option.description: An expectation of a system's functionality or quality property.
option.name: System Requirement

option.description: A specific architectural element of a physical system.
option.name: System Architecture Artefact

option.description: An expectation of a component's functionality or quality property.
option.name: Component Requirement

option.description: A specific architectural element of a physical component.
option.name: Component Architecture Artefact

option.description: An expectation of a software element's functionality or quality property.
option.name: Software Requirement

option.description: A software specific architecture artefact.
option.name: Software Architecture Artefact

option.description: An expectation of a hardware element's functionality or quality property.
option.name: Hardware Requirement

option.description: A hardware specific architecture artefact.
option.name: Hardware Architecture Artefact

option.description: An expectation of a mechanical element's functionality or quality property.
